description.de:
Alle Schurken sind besiegt und die Helden haben die Welt gerettet. Das klingt erst einmal gut, doch sind wirklich alle Helden gut? Nicht alle, die sich „Helden“ nennen, verhalten sich auch so: Eine Frau, deren Schwester von einem dieser „Helden“ getötet wurde, begibt sich auf die Mission, den Täter zu finden, und wird zum „Hero-Killer“, der jede Nacht Jagd auf korrupte Helden macht. Kann sie es schaffen, ihre Schwester zu rächen und die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3403)
description.en:
The world is in constant turmoil, with constant wars breaking out between Heroes and Villains.

Gifted with supernatural abilities, one lone girl sets out on a bloody path for revenge against the injustices of the world she lives in. With the constant clashes between titans, no one is safe.

If no one is willing to protect the innocent, who are the real heroes, and who are the real villains? What truly separates one from the other?
description.es:
El mundo está en constante agitación, con guerras constantes desatándose entre héroes y villanos. Dotada con habilidades extraordinarias, una chica solitaria recorre un camino sangriento de venganza contra las injusticias del mundo en el que vive. Con los enfrentamientos constantes entre los titanes, nadie está a salvo. Si nadie está dispuesto a proteger a los inocentes, ¿quiénes son los verdaderos héroes? ¿Quiénes son los verdaderos villanos? ¿Qué es lo que realmente separa a los unos de los otros?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3422)
description.fr:
Dotée de capacités surnaturelles, Ehwa, une jeune fille solitaire, s'engage sur un chemin sanglant afin de se venger pour sa soeur qui a été tuée par un "héros". Elle ne sait toujours pas qui de ces "héros" est responsable de sa mort, mais cela lui importe peu... car il suffit de les massacrer tous.

---
**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=3151)
description.hu: A világ állandó kavarodásban van, állandó háborúk törnek ki a Hősök és a Gonoszok között. Természetfölötti képességekkel felruházva egy magányos lány véres útra indul, hogy bosszút álljon a világ igazságtalanságai ellen, amelyben él. Ha senki sem hajlandó megvédeni az ártatlanokat, kik az igazi hősök és kik az igazi gonosztevők? Mi választja el igazán a másikat?
description.id:
Bertahun-tahun yang lalu, Ehwa kehilangan saudara perempuan karena seorang hero yang tidak dikenal. Sampai sekarang, tidak ada yang tahu siapa pembunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. Tetapi hal itu tidak masalah baginya, karena dia akan menghabisi semua hero yang ada di dunia.

---
Perang berakhir dengan kekalahan para villain. Sekarang dunia dikuasai oleh Hero yang korup. Dan Salah satu Hero tersebut membunuh saudara perempuan Ehwa. dia tidak tahu yang mana, tapi tidak masalah. Jika dia membunuh satu per satu, mereka akan ada di antara mereka. Ehwa menjadi Hero killer, Villain yang memburu para Hero setiap malam. "Aku akan membunuh semua orang dan akan mengambil semuanya!"

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/hero-killer/list?title_no=3083)
description.it: Il mondo è in costante fermento, con continue guerre scoppiate tra eroi e cattivi. Dotata di abilità soprannaturali, una ragazza solitaria intraprende un percorso sanguinoso per vendicarsi contro le ingiustizie del mondo in cui vive. Con i continui scontri tra titani, nessuno è al sicuro. Se nessuno è disposto a proteggere gli innocenti, chi sono i veri eroi e chi sono i veri cattivi? Cosa separa veramente l'uno dall'altro?
description.ko:
전쟁은 빌런들의 패배로 막을 내렸다.
이제 세상은 부패한 히어로들이 지배하고 있다.
그리고, 그런 히어로들 중 하나가 이화의 언니를 죽였다.
언니를 죽인 게 누구인지는 모르지만 상관없다.
한 놈씩 죽이다 보면 그중에 있을 테니까.
이화는 매일 밤 영웅들을 사냥하는 빌런, 히어로 킬러가 된다.
​
한 악당의 지독한 액션 활극.
“모조리 죽이고, 빼앗아 주마!”
description.th:
เรื่องราวสงครามระหว่างเหล่าฮีโร่และวายร้ายได้จบลงด้วยชัยชนะของกลุ่มฮีโร่ แต่โลกในตอนนี้กลับปกครองด้วยกลุ่มฮีโร่ที่ฉ้อฉล และหนึ่งในฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นได้ฆาตกรรมพี่สาวของอีฮวา อีฮวาไม่รู้เลยว่าฮีโร่คนไหนที่ลงมือฆ่าพี่สาวของเธอ เธอเลยตัดสินใจไล่ฆ่าพวกฮีโร่ไปทีละคน เธอคิดว่าถ้าฆ่าพวกฮีโร่กลุ่มนั้นให้หมด แล้วมันจะนำไปสู้การล้างแค้นให้พี่สาวเธอได้ การล้างแค้นของวายร้ายผู้สิ้นหวังได้เริ่มต้นขึ้น “ฉันจะฆ่าพวกแกทุกคน ฉันจะพรากทุกอย่างที่แกมีไปจากแก”

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=2840)
description.zh-hk:
戰爭在反派的敗北下落幕了，而世界由腐敗的英雄們接手掌控。 然而，其中一個英雄殺了苡禾的姐姐。 她不在乎兇手是誰，反正把他們全部殺掉就可以了。 苡禾每晚都會行動，成為了英雄殺手的反派角色。 一個壞蛋的殘忍獵殺行動。「全部殺掉！全部搶走！」

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/hero-killer/list?title_no=5647)

altTitles.ja: 俺ともう一度、初恋。

altTitles.ja-ro: Ore to mou Ichido First Love.

description.en:
I fell in love with fate. But the memory of that love disappeared. Four men were waiting for her when she lost her memory. It seems that just before she lost her memory, she chose one of these men as her fiancé. She had even decided to get engaged, but now she has to redo her first love. You might already be in a trap!

All of them are seriously trying to get married, and the exciting reverse love story is about to begin!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!
description.pt-br: Depois que sua vila foi atacada por um bando de ladrões, Lynn se levantou para proteger seus amigos e o mundo com a ajuda de uma Espada Mágica, que contém a alma de um herói...? Uma história de fantasia/ação com uma heroína sem precedentes(?)

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.pt: As Três Fadas Orientais - Sagrado Local Oriental

altTitles.ja: 東方三月精 - Oriental Sacred Place

description.en:
The third part in the official long-running series about the daily shenanigans of Gensokyo's biggest pranksters, the Three Fairies of Light.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.  
  
**Português:**  
Continuação do Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.

altTitles.en: Onee-san is into Elementary School Girls

altTitles.ja: お姉さんは女子小学生に興味があります。

description.en:
From the mangaka of Hshs Sasero!!, the comedic story about a high school teacher, who happens to be a lolicon, and the girl she babysits with her roommate!

altTitles.ja: お姉サンド

altTitles.en: The Blue Star on That Day

altTitles.ja: あの頃の青い星

description.en: Koumoto Umi, a normal high school girl, falls in love with the pretty girl from the class next door, Segawa Shou. Even though she feels overwhelmed by her feelings, she can’t help but want to get closer to the mysterious Shou.
description.pt-br: Koumoto Umi, uma garota normal do ensino médio, se apaixona pela garota bonita da sala ao lado, Segawa Shou. Mesmo que ela se sinta sobrecarregada com esses sentimentos, ela não consegue evitar de se aproximar da misteriosa Shou.

title.en: Heroic Chronicles of the Three Continents

altTitles.ja: 三大陸英雄記

description.en:
Possessing memories of being born, raised, and died in a country called Japan… the young boy Hercule was born in the imperial household of a declining empire. This empire that once was a superpower that reigned over the world… is now a country nearing its end. The public finances are on bankruptcy, the military strength declined to the point that barbarians are able to wreak havoc on their territories and the neighboring countries squeezed the Empire for tribute payments every year. And the young Hercule is forced to take over this empire!  
  
Thus, the 12-year-old Hercule ascends to the throne. Using the knowledge from his previous life, Hercule struggles to rebuild the empire… reforming the tax system, revolutionizing the industry, reorganizing the public finances, rebuilding the administration, and reforming the military system. This will later be known as the story of the young emperor who restored the Lemurian empire, which would later carve its name in history as the great monarch of the three continents, the "Divine Light Emperor" Hercule the First.  
- [WN (Raw)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4694ep)

title.en: Infinite Job Transfer: I Can Summon Max Level Goddess

altTitles.zh: 无限转职：我能召唤满级女神

description.en: Yun Xinghe, who encountered a bizarre car accident, opened his eyes and found himself in a dangerous world. What's worse, a beautiful fairy did a series of shameful things to him and said she would be responsible for him. Hey... what are you talking about! ? I'm a gentleman... Wait, what's the point of unlimited job transfer? Where's the beauty around me? ! ! !

altTitles.ja: 聖くんは清く生きたい

altTitles.ne: हिजिरी-कुन एक पवित्र जीवन बिताउन चाहन्छ

altTitles.en: Hijiri-kun Wants to Live a Pure Life

altTitles.es-la: Hijiri-kun quiere vivir una vida pura

description.en:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!

This is an unusual romantic comedy for those of you who have things you can't tell others!
description.ja: 文武両道、容姿端麗、パーフェクトな生徒会長を演じ切る男、土御門聖。そんな聖が放課後に見てしまったのは、いつもはおとなしいクラスメイト・佐渡さんがドSに教師をいじめる姿だった――！佐渡の秘められし性癖に、完璧な生徒会長が巻き込まれていく…！人には言えないコトがあるアナタに贈る、異色ラブコメ！
description.es-la:
Tsuchimikado Hijiri es un hombre que desempeña el papel del perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil, con su buena apariencia y excelentes calificaciones tanto en la escuela como en los deportes.  Después de la escuela, es testigo de cómo su normalmente tranquila compañera de clase, Sado Mitsuki, atormenta a su maestro Tamura de una manera muy sádica.  ¡El perfecto presidente del consejo estudiantil queda atrapado en el fetiche secreto de Sado-san!

 ¡Esta es una comedia romántica inusual para aquellos que tienen cosas que no pueden contarles a los demás!

altTitles.ja: 夜桜さんちの大作戦

altTitles.vi: Nhiệm vụ tối thượng nhà Yozakura

altTitles.es-la: La Misión de la Familia Yozakura

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
description.es: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.fr:
Afin de protéger Mutsumi et de découvrir la véritable raison de la mort de ses parents, Taiyo Asano va devoir devenir membre de la famille Yozakura, une famille d’espions de haut vol ! Parviendra-t-il à survivre à ce quotidien plein de dangers pour, cette fois, réussir à protéger ceux qui lui sont chers ?

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.it:
:||Tradotto da [Isekai Italy Scan](https://linktr.ee/isitscan/) e [Bullet Club](https://mangadex.org/group/8588/bullet-club)   
  
Taiyo Asano è un timidissimo studente delle superiori e l'unica persona a cui può parlare è la sua amica d'infanzia, Mutsumi Yozakura. Si scopre che Mutsumi è la figlia della suprema famiglia di spie! Ancora peggio, Mustumi viene tormentata dal suo fratello iperprotettivo, Kyoichiro. Quale tragico destino Taiyo dovrà affrontare per salvare Mustumi?! Una commedia su una famiglia di spie - la missione avrà inizio!||
description.es-la: Taiyo Asano es un estudiante de secundaria súper tímido y la única persona con la que puede hablar es su amiga de la infancia, Mutsumi Yozakura. ¡Resulta que Mutsumi es la hija de una última familia de espías! Peor aún, Mutsumi está siendo acosada por su sobreprotector hermano, Kyoichiro. ¿Qué decisión tendrá que tomar Taiyo para salvar a Mutsumi? Una comedia familiar de espías: ¡Comienza la misión!
description.pt-br: Taiyo Asano é um estudante super tímido do ensino médio e a única pessoa com quem ele consegue conversar é sua amiga de infância, Mutsumi Yozakura. Acontece que Mutsumi é a filha da melhor família de espiões! Pior ainda, Mutsumi está sendo assediada por seu super-protetor, o pesadelo de um irmão, Kyoichiro. Que passos drásticos Taiyo terá que tomar para salvar Mutsumi? Uma comédia familiar de espiões – a missão começa!

altTitles.ja: Angel Beats! スピンオフ!!　旅する天使ちゃん

description.en: Kanade Tachibana is a cute girl who is called "Tenshi-chan" at school. She traveled all over the country in search of "someone". During her travels, when she stops by Kanagawa, she meets Yuri Nakamura, a lively and cheerful girl. People who look a lot like SSS members also appear on the road!? Will Angel be able to find "a certain person"...?
description.vi:
Đây là một spin-off của "Angel Beats!".

Tachibana Kanade là một cô gái xinh xắn được các bạn ở trường gọi là "Thiên sứ-chan". Cô đang du hành xuyên Nhật Bản để tìm kiếm "một ai đó". Dọc đường, khi đi ngang qua Kanagawa, cô gặp một cô nàng năng nổ và vui tính tên Nakamura Yuri.

Những người giống hệt các thành viên của chiến tuyến SSS cũng sẽ xuất hiện trong chuyến du hành của Thiên sứ-chan. Liệu cuối cùng cô sẽ có thể tao ngộ cùng "ai đó"?

altTitles.ja: ルリドラゴン

description.en:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
description.tr: Tembellik ve çalışkanlık arasında git gel yaşayan ejder kızın gündelik maceraları.
description.pt-br: Ruri Aoki é uma garota normal que um dia acorda com um par de chifres em sua cabeça. De acordo com sua mãe, o pai de Ruri, que ela nunca conheceu antes, é um dragão e Ruri só é metade humana. Esta é a história da jornada de autodescobrimento e aceitação de uma garota metade humana, metade dragão.

altTitles.ja: 陰の実力者になりたくて！

altTitles.en: I Want To Be The Eminence In Shadow!
To Be a Power in the Shadows!

description.en:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
description.ru:
Подобно тому, как некоторые в детстве боготворят героев, один юноша обожал силы, скрывающиеся в тени. Скрыв свою силу и прожив посредственную жизнь посредственного персонажа, проходя в это время через безумные ночные тренировки, он в конце концов перерождается в ином мире, обретая абсолютную силу. Юноша, отыгрывающий роль скрывающейся в тени силы, его неправильно всё понимающие подчинённые и огромная стёртая в пыль теневая организация… Это история о юноше, обожавшем скрывающиеся во мраке силы, который, вероятно, в итоге обретёт власть над теневой стороной иного мира.   
  
  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Bookwalker)](https://bookwalker.jp/series/179219/)  
- [Japanese Light Novel (Amazon.co.jp)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4047353027/)  
- [LN Vol. 1 Youtube Promo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9pahhkIs4Ss),with Kentarou Kumagai (熊谷健太郎) voicing the MC (Cid Kagenou)
description.es-la: Tal cual como todos adoraban héroes en su niñez, cierto adolescente adoraba los poderes que se esconden en las sombras. Tras haber ocultado su fuerza y viviendo la vida mediocre de un mob durante el día y entrenando descontroladamente por la noche, él finalmente reencarna en un mundo diferente y gana el poder definitivo. El adolescente que solo juega a ser una eminencia en las sombras, sus subordinados confusos, y una gigante organización en las sombras que es pisoteada... Esta es la historia de un adolescente que adoraba esos poderes en las sombras y que posiblemente llegue a reinar en las sombras de otro mundo.

altTitles.ja: ねこに転生したおじさん

altTitles.en: The Old Man Who Was Reincarnated as a Cat

description.en: An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.

Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

description.uk: Після прийняття закону про заборону тілесних покарань у 2011 році, в школах почався суцільний безлад. Учні вчинили масовий переворот, змінивши шкільний устрій, а працівники учбових закладів втратити свій авторитет. На Хваджін, член Бюро захисту освіти, починає «реальну освіту», щоб встановити порядок.
description.pt-br: As técnicas de ensino de Hwajin Na são bastante violentas para quem trabalha no Ministério da Educação. Dito isso, quando as punições não parecem funcionar nem mesmo com o pior dos valentões da escola, não há homem melhor para o trabalho. Às vezes, você não pode obter uma boa educação até que esses valentões aprendam uma lição.

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

title.en: Kiyoubinbou, Jou wo Tateru - Kaitaku Gakuen no Rettousei na no ni, Joukyuu-shoku no Skill to Mahou ga Subete Tsukaemasu @COMIC

altTitles.ja: 器用貧乏、城を建てる ～開拓学園の劣等生なのに、上級職のスキルと魔法がすべて使えます～@COMIC

altTitles.en: Exiled in a Class Trial for Poor Dexterity

Exiled in a Class Trial for “Poor Dexterity”. Because He Was Dexterous, He Lived on His Own. Because of His Dexterity, He Was Able to Use All the Skills and Magic of the Higher Ranks, Making Him Invincible. I Decided to Live on My Own, but the People Around Me Wouldn’t Leave Me Alone.

description.en:
The boy Leopin was born with unnaturally high dexterity. From an early age, he used his dexterity to contribute to his peers in a variety of crafts. Leopin and his friends entered the Royal Pioneer Academy. However, during the “Ritual of Ability Development” at the entrance ceremony, the status given to Leopin was disastrous.

“Occupation: Unemployed.”

“All statuses except dexterity remain at their initial values and do not grow.”

“Skill is dextrous master of none”

Leopin’s classmates exiled him because he had nothing to offer other than his dexterity. Leopin is placed in the “Special Training Class”, a class for failures. Leopin is left all alone. However, he realizes that the skill he has been given, “Poor Dexterity,” has an unexpected performance. That is…

You can convert your dexterity status to any other status.
You can change your occupation to any one you want.

The first thing Leopin did was to become a lumberjack. First, Leopin changed his job to “Lumberjack” to get wood from the forest. He then became a carpenter and built the most magnificent house of all. He became an Appraiser to identify rare items, and a Battle Axe User to fight off students from other classes who tried to attack him. Become a Ranger to explore dungeons and a Ninja to get through traps with ease.

Leopin, alone (solo), had gained enough power to do everything.

As Leopin continues to be a warrior, he is adored by his childhood friend, a saint, and admired by a beautiful alchemist, and his activities become even more well known. On the other hand, the classmates who expelled Leopin regret their decision to do so when they witness Leopin’s abilities.

Their home remains a shack, they are unable to explore, and they gradually lose their place in the school and are ruined.

*Explanation: the skill is not “poor dexterity”, but “dexterous poor”, which is the Japanese equivalent to a Jack of all trades, master of none; since they can do a bit of everything, they are “dexterous”, but since they have mastered none, they supposedly cannot make a living from it, hence they are “poor”.  Another manner of saying you have high dexterity is to be "handy", back-translated from DEX as in *manual* dexterity from early RPGs.  "An unemployed handyman who does a bit of everything" just doesn't quite roll off the tongue.

altTitles.es: Ogenki Clinic, La Clínica del Amor

altTitles.ja: お元気クリニック

description.en:
The plotline revolves around the quirky (and perpetually horny) Doctor Sawaru Ogenki and his beautiful nurse, the busty Ruko Tatase, who help patients through their problems, and the cure almost always involves sex. The patients suffer from bizarre sexual problems and our doctor and nurse are more than willing to cure them from their problem.

**Note:** The release from Studio Ironcat (Ex-Licenses) is **read** from **left to right**.

altTitles.en: TONIKAWA: Over The Moon For You

altTitles.ja: トニカクカワイイ

description.en:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
description.ru:
Тяжело жить, если родители дали тебе имя НАСА - да, как NASA, и каждый второй спрашивает, пойдешь ли ты в астронавты. Еще тяжелее, если в один день тебя собьет грузовик, ты встретишь любовь всей своей жизни и тут же ее потеряешь, согласившись жениться на ней. Мужик сказал, что женится - значит женись. И заверьте… Веселая комедия положений без особой логики, но с неожиданными поворотами сюжета. Ведь жена и правда с Луны?..   
  
**Tonikaku Cawaii is the official romanization.**
description.pt-br: Aceito sair com você se você se casar comigo.

description.en:
Woken up from a date, he’s suddenly in a movie set? Wait, he’s been reborn as a baby martial artist!  
  
In Jongnam Clan, which was once one of the 9 strongest clans, he receives the name “Gunchung” and uses the knowledge of his past life to learn the true meaning of martial arts.  
  
When your perspective is different, your martial arts changes. Armed with knowledge, Gunchung brings about a new age of martial arts!

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

title.en: The Hundred Ghost Stories That Led to My Death

altTitles.ja: 僕が死ぬだけの百物語
Boku ga Shinu dake no Hyakumonogatari

altTitles.en: Hundred Ghost Stories of My Own Death

description.en:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
description.pt-br: Série de terror antológica detalhando a "Rodada das 100 Histórias de Fantasmas", muitas vezes usado como um teste de coragem, onde os participantes contam cem histórias sobrenaturais,  apagam uma vela e se olham no espelho depois de terminar cada história. Quando a centésima vela é apagada, diz-se que fantasmas e demônios são convocados ao nosso mundo. Um antigo conto popular originário do Japão recontado por de Yuuma, um menino que vive em uma casa problemática.

altTitles.ja: ハンター×ハンター
HUNTER×HUNTER カラー版

altTitles.en: Hunter x Hunter - Digital Colored Comics

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.pt-br: Versão totalmente colorida do famoso mangá "Hunter x Hunter". Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhu Jie Mo Ri Zai Xian

description.en: When the end of the world came, in the hopeless darkness, Gu Qingshan broke away from time and space, and returned to the world before it collapsed, determined to change his fate. But as time went on, he gradually realized that the apocalypse is not as simple as it seemed…

altTitles.ja: 医員、蘇る

altTitles.vi: Bác Sĩ Trùng Sinh Về Murim

description.en:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jin’s life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! He’s reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

description.fr:
J'étais à l'étranger pour faire du bénévolat médical, lorsque la guerre civile a éclaté. J'ai été tué par un soldat rebelle, alors que je prenais une balle pour un patient. Mais quand je me suis finalement réveillé, j'étais devenu un enfant!  
  
Et devant moi se tenait une charrette détruite et un groupe de personnes bizarrement vêtues, qui étaient inconscientes!  
  
"C'est exactement comme un monde de Murim."  
  
Alors que je m'empresse de prodiguer les premiers soins pour tenter de sauver ne serait-ce qu'une personne, je réalise que ce monde est celui du [Roi Démon Suprême], un roman de Murim que j'ai pris plaisir à lire.  
  
Après avoir rencontré l'équipe de secours des "Trois Grands Docteurs", j'ai découvert qu'une des personnes que j'ai sauvées était le protagoniste de ce roman, le futur Roi Démon "Yeoharyun"!

"Hé, puisque je te suis redevable de m'avoir sauvé, appelle-moi "hyung"."

Pour lui avoir sauvé la vie, je suis devenu frère de sang du futur Roi Démon, et Baekrineuison, l'une des personnes les mieux informées, a reconnu mon potentiel et m'a pris comme disciple. C'est ainsi que je suis devenu le plus grand médecin de Gangho!

海外医療奉仕先で内戦に巻き込まれ、患者を庇い、反乱軍の銃に撃たれたはずが、目を覚ますと子供の姿になっていた！？ 目の前には壊れた馬車と不思議な服装を着て倒れている人々！ ”まるで武侠の世界のようだ” １人でも救おうと応急処置をしていたところ、ここが日頃からよく読んでいた武侠小説「至尊天魔」の中の世界だということに気づく。 そこで「天下三大医員」の白鱗医仙に出会うが…

description.ko:
[독점연재]

해외 의료 봉사를 갔다가 내전에 휘말렸다.
환자 대신 반군의 총을 맞고 간신히 눈을 떴는데
아니, 어린아이가 됐잖아?!?

눈앞에 있는 건 부서진 마차와 특이한 복식의 쓰러진 사람들!

"꼭 무림 세계 같네."

한 명이라도 살리기 위해 응급처치를 하던 중,
이곳이 즐겨 읽던 무협 소설,
[지존천마] 속 세상이라는 것을 알게 되고.

'천하삼대의원' 백린의선을 비롯한 구조대를 만나
내가 구한 이들 중 하나가 이 소설의 주인공,
미래의 천마 '여하륜'이라는 것을 깨닫게 되었다!

"야, 살려 준 은혜가 있으니 형이라 불러라."

목숨을 구해 준 은혜로 미래의 천마와는 의형제를 맺고,
재능을 눈여겨 본 백린의선과는 사제 지간을 맺어
강호제일신의가 되는 진천희의 일대기!

지금 시작합니다!

description.ru:
Поехал на медицинское волонтёрство, а попал на гражданскую войну. Хотел спасти пациента – получил пулю и умер. А после… стал ребенком?!
Разграбленные повозки, люди в необычных одеждах – всё это напоминает мир Мурим. Оказав первую помощь пострадавшим, после встретив спасательный отряд из «Лечебницы трёх поколений поднебесной» и самого Пэк Рин Ый Сона, я осознал, что нахожусь в мире романа про боевые искусства «Величайший небесный демон».
Один из тогда спасённых мною – главный герой книги, будущий небесный демон – Ё Ха Рюн. «Эй, за то, что спас, можешь звать меня старшим братом» – вот так мы с ним сдружились. А Пэк Рин Ый Сон, рассмотревший во мне талант, стал мне учителем.
Меня зовут Чин Чхон Хи, я - последняя надежда Канхо, и это моя история!

description.th:
จินชอนฮี' ถูกจับพลัดจับผลูไปเป็นแพทย์อาสาอยู่ในพื้นที่ที่เกิดสงครามกลางเมือง
วันหนึ่งคนไข้ของเขาถูกฝ่ายกบฎใช้ปืนจ่อหมายเอาชีวิต
ทำให้เขาต้องเอาตัวเข้าไปขวางจนถูกยิงในที่สุด

ขณะที่กำลังปลงกับชีวิตและกำลังจะหมดลมหายใจ
จินชอนฮีก็ลืมตามาพบว่าตนเองอยู่ในร่างเด็ก
เท่านั้นยังไม่พอเขายังสวมชุดโบราณด้วย!

ลืมตามาได้ไม่เท่าไหร่เขาก็ต้องใช้วิชาที่เรียนมารักษาผู้คนที่บาดเจ็บ
และหนึ่งในนั้นก็คือจอมยุทธ์จากสำนัก 'ม้าด่วนมังกรเมฆา'
แล้วต่อมา 'แพ็คลิน' หนึ่งในหมอสามสำนักแพทย์ใหญ่ในใต้หล้า
ก็ปรากฎตัวขึ้น!

เขาจึงได้รู้ว่าตัวเองนั้นหลุดมาอยู่ในนิยายธีมยุทธภพ
เรื่อง 'จอมมารสวรรค์' ที่เขาเคยอ่านในโลกที่จากมา

ในเมื่อยังไม่รู้วิธีที่จะออกจากโลกนี้เขาจึงต้องใช้วิชาแพทย์ที่เคยร่ำเรียน
และความได้เปรียบจากการเป็นแฟนคลับตัวยงของนิยาย
เอาชีวิตรอดในโลกยุทธภพแห่งนี้!

altTitles.ja: 尾守つみきと奇日常。

altTitles.en: Tsumiki Ogami & the Strange Everyday Life.

altTitles.es: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.es-la: Tsumiki Omori y la extraña vida cotidiana.

altTitles.pt-br: Tsumiki Ogami e seu estranho coditiano.

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami Và Cuộc Sống DIệu Kỳ

altTitles.ru: Цумики Огами и странная повседневная жизнь

altTitles.fr: Ogami Tsumiki et l'étrange vie du quotidien

altTitles.vi: Tsumiki Ogami và Cuộc sống diệu kì!

description.en:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind.

When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.

The new normal graph of youth is about to begin.
description.es: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.fr:
Aujourd'hui, nous vivons à l'ère de la diversité. L'expression « non-humains » appartient au passé. Les « Genjin » vivent leur vie en interaction avec les êtres humains.

Un garçon humain, Yutaka Shinsou, est troublé. Il est tellement habitué à être en phase avec son environnement qu'il ne comprend plus ses propres sentiments. Au lycée Keiki, que fréquentent de nombreux « Genjin », il rencontre Tsumiki Ogami, un loup-garou. Elle est mignonne, puissante, un peu hors du commun et gentille.

Lorsqu'il passe du temps avec elle, le cœur de Yutaka est plus bruyant que d'habitude. Une vie quotidienne « inhabituelle » avec Tsumiki le loup-garou.

Le nouveau parcours normal de la jeunesse est sur le point de commencer.
description.ja:
ウェアウルフの尾守つみきさんと紡ぐ、「普通」じゃない日常――

多様性の時代とされる現代。ついこの間まで「人ならざる存在」だった「幻人」は今は人間と関わり合って生活しています。

舞台は、幻人が多く通う景希高校。そこにいたのは、ウェアウルフの尾守つみき（おがみつみき）さん。モフモフの耳と尻尾が揺れる、天真爛漫な美少女。

真層友孝（しんそうゆたか）くんは、悩める人間の少年。人間関係が原因で、自分のことが分からなくなりました。友孝くんはつみきさんと出会い、自分の「気持ち」を見つけていきます。

「…人間って大変だぁ～」
日常が変わっていく、つみきさんと一緒なら。

まだ誰も知らない、ニューノーマルな青春がここに。
description.pl:
Obecnie żyjemy w erze różnorodności. Wyrażenie „nie-ludzie” należy już do przeszłości. „Genjin” żyją w interakcji z ludźmi.

Pewien ludzki chłopiec, Yutaka Shinsou, jest zaniepokojony. Jest tak przyzwyczajony do bycia w zgodzie z otoczeniem, że nie rozumie już własnych uczuć. W Liceum Keiki, gdzie uczęszcza wielu „Genjin”, spotyka Tsumiki Ogami, wilkołaka. Jest urocza, potężna, trochę nietypowa i miła.

Kiedy spędza z nią czas, serce Yutaki staje się głośniejsze niż zwykle. Niezwykłe niecodzienne życie z wilkołakiem Tsumiki.
description.ru: Сегодня мы живём в эпоху культурного разнообразия. "Нелюди" постепенно ушли из словесного оборота. "Гендзины" живут своей жизнью, взаимодействуя с людьми. Один из человеческих мальчиков, Ютака Шинсо, кое-чем обеспокоен. Он настолько привык быть в гармонии со своим окружением, что перестал понимать свои собственные чувства. В средней школе Кэйки, где учатся многие "гендзины", он знакомится с оборотнем Цумики Огами. Она милая, сильная, немного странная и добрая... Когда Ютака проводит с ней время, его сердце почему-то бьется чаще обычного.
description.es-la: Hoy vivimos en la era de la diversidad. La expresión "no humanos" es cosa del pasado. Los "genjin" viven sus vidas interactuando con los seres humanos. Un chico humano, Yutaka Shinsou, tiene problemas. Está tan acostumbrado a estar en sintonía con su entorno que ya no comprende sus propios sentimientos. En el instituto Keiki, al que acuden muchos "genjin", conoce a Tsumiki Ogami, una mujer lobo. Es guapa, poderosa, un poco fuera de lo común y amable... Cuando pasa tiempo con ella, el corazón de Yutaka hace más ruido de lo normal. Hilando una "inusual" vida cotidiana con Tsumiki, la mujer lobo. El nuevo gráfico normal de la juventud está a punto de comenzar.
description.pt-br:
Hoje, vivemos numa era de diversidade. A frase “não-humanos” é coisa do passado. “Genjin” vivem suas vidas interagindo com seres humanos.

Um menino humano, Yutaka Shinsou, está preocupado. Ele está tão acostumado a estar em sintonia com o ambiente que não entende mais seus próprios sentimentos. No Colégio Keiki, onde muitos "Genjin" estudam, ele conhece Tsumiki Ogami, uma lobisomem. Ela é fofa, poderosa, um pouco fora do comum e gentil.

Quando ele passa um tempo com ela, o coração de Yutaka fica mais acelerado do que o normal. Girando uma vida cotidiana "incomum" com o lobisomem Tsumiki.

O novo gráfico normal da juventude está prestes a começar.

altTitles.ja: セトウツミ

title.en: My Love for My Roommate is One-Sided

altTitles.ja: 同居人に片思いしてる百合漫画

altTitles.ja-ro: Doukyonin ni Kataomoi Shiteru Yuri Manga

description.en:
Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) is the student president of Taeyang (Sunny) High. He is not just a smart student but an extreme biker with high techniques. As you follow his bike, you will meet his friends, love, and adventures.

---

**Contents:**
- **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65)
- **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130)
- **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257)
- **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375)
- **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)
description.fr:
Nous suivons l’histoire de Jay un jeune lycéen étudiant et président du conseil des élèves de la Sunny High.

Alors qu’il était en train de faire du vélo, ce dernier se fera rapidement repérer par Minu, membre de la Zephyrus Crew, un groupe de cycliste. Le jeune homme ayant été impressionné par les compétences de Jay tentera de le recruter dans son équipe, chose que le président du conseil des élèves refusera catégoriquement.

Voyant les nombreux refus de ce dernier, Minu abandonnera l’idée de le recruter et lui proposera simplement de faire une course contre TJ, également membre de la Zephyrus Crew. Alors que Jay s’apprêtait à décliné son offre, Minu lui dira que ce fameux TJ a insulté son vélo, disant qu’il ne s’agissait que d’un tas de ferraille. Fou de rage, Jay acceptera finalement de prendre part à la course…
description.pt: Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) é o Presidente do Conselho estudantil da Taeyang (Sunny) High. ele não é somente um aluno inletigente mas um ciclista incrível com ótimas técnicas. enquanto você segue a bicicleta dele, irá conhecer seus amigos, amor e as aventuras.

altTitles.ja: 失敗家族

description.en: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.

altTitles.ja: はっちぽっちぱんち,

description.en:
She was destroying people… in her mind.

Kiho Ishiguro is a high school girl who's an honor student at school, and devotes herself to her disabled mother at home. She is quiet and gentle, but deep down inside she has always had the urge to "hit someone." As her feelings gets stronger day by day, Kiho encounters a street criminal. She snaps and unleashes her rage on the bad guy without restraint…? Here comes the JK who will revolutionize the world of women's MMA!
description.es: Kuroishi Kiho, en la escuela es una estudiante ejemplar, en casa es una buena hija que ayuda a su madre con sus problemas en las piernas... pero en sus fantasías, es alguien que hace pedazos a la gente. Aunque parece tranquila y gentil, en lo más profundo de su corazón existe un impulso que la hace querer "golpear a otros". Desbordada por las fantasías que no la dejan en paz, decide confrontar a un violador, ¿Será capaz de liberar y apaciguar sus emociones reprimidas con este criminal? ¡Entra en escena la estudiante de preparatoria que podría revolucionar las artes marciales de mujeres!

altTitles.vi: Bắt nạt mình đi mà, nữ phản diện ơi!

altTitles.th: โปรดรังแกฉันทีคุณนางร้าย!

altTitles.zh-ro: Qǐng qīfù wǒ ba, è yì xiǎojiě!

altTitles.ru: Пожалуйста, поиздевайтесь надо мной, мисс Злодейка!

altTitles.pt-br: Por favor, me humilhe, senhorita vilã!

altTitles.ar: !تنمرِ علي من فضلكِ يا أنسة الشر

altTitles.fr: Je vous en supplie madame l'antagoniste, Harcelez moi !

altTitles.ja: いじめてください、悪役令嬢様！

description.en: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
description.es: Yo, Yvonne, reencarné en un juego otome como la villana. Según la trama del juego, un personaje detestado por todos como yo tiene el papel principal de acosar a la heroína, empujándola hacia las rutas románticas de los distintos intereses amorosos. Pero parece que a Elsa, la heroína, le pasa algo. ¡Se está acercando demasiado a mí!
description.fr: Moi, Yvonne, me suis réincarnée en riche prétentieuse dans un jeu otome. Selon l’intrigue du jeu, je suis détestée de tous et j’ai pour rôle d’harceler l’héroïne. Mais il y a quelque chose de bizarre avec Elsa, l’héroïne ! Elle se rapproche trop de moi !
description.id: Aku, Yvonne, bereinkarnasi dalam otome game sebagai penjahat kaya. Menurut plot permainan, karakter yang dibenci oleh semua orang seperti aku memiliki peran utama menindas sang heroin, mendorongnya ke berbagai rute romantis minat cinta. Tapi sepertinya ada yang salah dengan Elsa, sang heroine! Dia terlalu dekat denganku!
description.ru: Я, Ивонна, перевоплотилась в отомэ-игру в роли богатой злодейки. Согласно сюжету игры, у ненавистного всем персонажа, такого как я, главная роль - издеваться над героиней, подталкивая её к романтическим интригам. Но кажется, что с Эльзой, что-то не так! Она становится слишком близка ко мне!
description.zh: 我，伊芳，转生成为了乙女游戏中的恶役千金。 按照恶役文的套路来说，像我这种集万千读者厌恶于一身的角色，主要作用当然是欺负女主角、推进其和攻略角色的恋爱线了。 可是——这个女主爱莎像是有什么大病！ 都、都说了太近了，不要再靠过来了！ 爱莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺负是什么呢~
description.zh-hk: 我，伊芳，轉生成為了乙女遊戲中的惡役千金。按照惡役文的套路來說，像我這種集萬千讀者厭惡於一身的角色，主要作用當然是欺負女主角、推進其和攻略角色的戀愛線了。可是——這個女主愛莎像是有什麼大病！都、都說了太近了，不要再靠過來了！愛莎：“小伊小伊~ 今日份的欺負是什麼呢~

title.en: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

altTitles.ja-ro: Shiori Experience - Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan

altTitles.ja: SHIORI EXPERIENCE ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~
シオリエクスペリエンス  ~ジミなわたしとヘンなおじさん~

altTitles.ru: Shiori Experience: незаурядный Джими и заурядная Я

altTitles.uk: Досвід Шіорі ~Джимі, я і дивний дядько~

description.en:
Shiori was once a guitarist in a light music club in high school. But her first live performance was dashed when her brother ran away from home with a lot of debt, to become a musician in Tokyo.  
  
A decade later, Shiori is now a high school teacher, leading a boring, uneventful life and paying off the debt… till she runs into the ghost of none other than a famous guitarist Jim-you-know-who.  
  
A story of a 27-year-old woman on her way to a music legend begins here.
description.ru: История о Шиори, скромной и неуклюжей 27-летней школьной учительнице, которая любит играть на гитаре и общается с призраком Джими Хендрикса.
description.pt-br: Shiori era uma guitarrista em um clube de música no colégio. Mas sua primeira apresentação ao vivo foi frustrada quando seu irmão fugiu de casa deixando um monte de dívidas para se tornar um músico em Tóquio. Uma década depois, Shiori é agora uma professora do ensino médio, levando uma vida monótona e entediante pagando as dívidas... Até ela dar de cara com o fantasma de ninguém menos que um famoso guitarrista chamado Jim-você-sabe-quem. A história de uma mulher de 27 anos de idade, a caminho de uma lenda musical começa aqui.

altTitles.ja: 恋喰少女

description.en:
High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women.

Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again.

However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five! A brain-shaking, romantic comedy suspense begins!
description.es-la: Oishi Kyou es un chico que siempre ha tenido un fuerte miedo a las chicas. Cuando comienza su primer día de clases en la preparatoria, se ve abrumado al recibir confesiones de amor por parte de cinco chicas diferentes. Sin embargo, descubre que cuatro de ellas son en realidad chicas ‘Devoradoras de Amor’, chicas que buscan seducir a los hombres para alimentarse de sus sentimientos, y sus presas favoritas son los sentimientos del ‘Primer Amor’, gracias a cierta persona el Protagonista sabe que 4 chicas de primer año son ‘Devoradoras de Amor’ así que, dentro de estas 5 chicas hay una que se confesó realmente a Oishi, así que se propone a encontrar a la única chica entre las 5 que realmente lo ama, todo sea antes de que devoren sus sentimientos.
description.pt-br:
O estudante do ensino médio, Kyo Oishi, tem medo de mulheres.
 
De repente, cinco garotas se declaram para ele. Entre elas, quatro são criaturas chamadas Devoradoras de Amor - seres que devoram sentimentos românticos humanos. Se ele tiver seus sentimentos românticos consumidos por essas garotas, ele nunca mais será capaz de amar novamente.
 
No entanto, ele não pode abandonar os sentimentos daquela que se declarou para ele de verdade - Kyo decide encontrar a única que realmente ama ele entre as cinco! Começa uma comédia romântica de suspense que balança o cérebro!

title.en: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku

altTitles.en: Reincarnated Devil’s Plan for Raising the Strongest Hero

altTitles.ja: 転生悪魔の最強勇者育成計画

description.en:
Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level demon in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another “different world,” liberated from the harsh underworld.

Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated.

Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt…!?
description.id: Kakyu, yang dulunya orang jepang terlahir kembali sebagai iblis tingkat rendah di neraka, telah memperoleh kekuatan yang tak tertandingi selama dua ribu tahun. Namun, dengan tak terduga, ia diasingkan ke “dunia lain” yang berbeda, terbebas dari dunia bawah yang keras. Kakyu, yang menikmati hidup lambat impian, menyaksikan desa tempat dia berhutang segalanya diserang. Meskipun bergegas ke tempat kejadian, desa tersebut dihancurkan. Mengangkat bayi yang selamat, Ars, Kakyu bertekad untuk membesarkan Ars agar menjadi orang paling bahagia di dunia untuk membayar hutangnya…!?

altTitles.ja: 働かないふたり

description.en: A slice-of-life story about two siblings, both jobless shut-ins. Haruko is a teenage girl who shares with her brother a love of laying around the house in sweats, watching television and playing video games. Her brother has a few friends, but Haruko has a lot of problems with social anxiety. The two of them pass their days happily playing together, though their mother worries about how she's going to get Haruko to shape up enough to find a husband.
description.pt: Haruko é uma adolescente que compartilha com seu irmão um amor de ficar em casa de moletom, assistindo televisão e jogando videogames. Seu irmão tem alguns amigos, mas Haruko tem um monte de problemas com ansiedade social. Os dois passam seus dias felizes brincando juntos, embora sua mãe se preocupa sobre como Haruko vai ficar e se melhorar o suficiente para encontrar um marido.
description.es-la: La historia del día a día de dos hermanos, ambos encerrados y sin trabajo. Haruko es una adolescente que comparte con su hermano el amor por holgazanear en la casa en sudaderas, mirar televisión y jugar videojuegos. Su hermano tiene algunos amigos, pero Haruko tiene muchos problemas de ansiedad social. Los dos pasan sus días felices jugando juntos, aunque a su madre le preocupa cómo hará que Haruko se ponga en forma lo suficiente como para encontrar un marido.

title.en: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru (Pre-Serialization)

altTitles.ja: 鬼売れアイドルが今日も私を推してくる

altTitles.en: The Superstar Idol Crushes on Me Today Too

description.en:
Enatsu Sayuki. An unsuccessful idol with a one-sided rivalry with the ever so popular Sera. 
Touma Sera. A superstar idol, perfect in every way, who will take every chance to shower Sayuki with love. 

A fun girls-love comedy capturing the chaotic and heartwarming moments of their daily lives!

-----

Series of shorts posted on Ookami's twitter.
**Info about the serialization can be found [[here](https://x.com/thinking_man000/status/1804074781358125330)]**

altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo: Chemarea Moscovei

description.en:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!  
  
Italian summary:  
||Moscow Calling è ambientato nella Russia del 2000. Il protagonista di questa storia è Georgiy Lastochkin, uno studente diciottenne russo con uno stand misterioso. Visto che vive a Vladivostok, studia all'università locale, e si prende una cotta per una delle sue compagne di corso. Da una parte deve affrontare la sua vita da studente - dall'altra, deve avere a che fare con i misteri del suo stand.  
  
Un giorno inizia a viaggiare per tutta la Russia, da Vladivostok a Mosca! Incontrerà dei fedeli amici e dei nemici intelligenti, una drammatica commedia, e ovviamente - battaglie con stand. Impara cosa significa essere un portatore di stand russo in Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: la chiamata di Mosca!||
description.vi:
Chào mừng đến với Vladivostok, thủ phủ vùng liên bang Viễn Đông, L.B.Nga. "Moscow Calling" kể về Georgiy Lastochkin, một sinh viên 18 tuổi. Sống ở Vladivostok, cậu học tại một trường đại học địa phương với cuộc sống bình thường như bao sinh viên khác.
Một ngày nọ, cậu bắt đầu hành trình của mình đi khắp nước Nga, hành trình từ Vladivostok đến tận Moskva!

title.en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: 売れ残りの奴隷エルフを拾ったので、娘にすることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Urenokori no Dorei Elf wo Hirotta no de, Musume ni suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.en: My Daughter was an Unsold Slave Elf.
I Picked up an Unsold Slave Elf, and Decided to Make Her My Daughter

description.en:
A magician named Weiss lives as he pleases in Zenith, a town filled with scoundrels, where he comes across an elf girl being sold as a slave. Weiss realizes that this girl dressed in ragged clothing is a high elf, a rare species that was supposed to have gone extinct, so he buys her and decides to raise her as his "daughter." 

This is a warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elf girl★

(Source: Young Champion)
description.ja: 悪人の街ゼニスで気ままに暮らす魔法使いのヴァイスは、奴隷として売られていたエルフの少女を見つける。ボロボロな身なりながらも、その少女が絶滅したはずの希少種であるハイエルフだと気づいたヴァイスは、彼女を購入し〝娘〟として育てることに。新米パパなヴァイスと、キュートな美幼女エルフのほっこりファンタジー★

altTitles.ja: 私、社畜辞めて動画で食べていきます

description.en:
Tired of her exhausting, thankless office work, Midorihara Mitsuha, a corporate slave, decided to quit and pursue her hobby: Making videos. She aims to bring happiness to everyone around the world with her ASMR contents, but it seems to have a different result than she'd imagined...

title.en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Nổi Loạn X Chàng Thợ May
Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: The Bisque doll is falling in love
The Bisque Doll Falls In Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

title.en: Re:Zero Kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Dainishou - Yashiki no Isshuukan Hen

description.en: Suddenly a high school student Subaru Natsuki has been summoned to another world on the way back from the convenience store. With the biggest crisis of his life being summoned to another world and no sign of the one who summoned him things become worse when he is attacked. But when he is saved by a mysterious silver-haired girl with a fairy cat, Subaru co-operates with the girl to return the favor. When they finally manage to get a clue Subaru and the girl are attacked and killed by someone. Subaru then awakens in the place he was summoned and notices the ability he gained "Returns by Death" a helpless boy that only has the ability to rewind time by dying. And beyond the despair can he save the girl from the fate of death!
description.ru: После спасения жизни Эмилии и возвращения ей инсигнии, Нацуки Субару был приглашен в особняк к лорду, где живет Эмилия. Нацуки устраивается на работу дворецким, и всё идёт хорошо, но вот только спустя несколько дней обнаруживается, что он опять откатился назад во времени, на момент, когда он только появился в особняке. Кто же в этот раз замочил бедного Нацуки?
description.pt-br: O estudante do ensino médio Natsuki Subaru foi convocado para um mundo de fantasia, enquanto estava nocaminho para casa vindo de uma loja de conveniência! Com base em seu conhecimento de histórias onde as pessoas são transportados para outros mundos, ele assumiu que ele deve ter algum tipo de super poder, mas essa suposição acabou deixando ele espancadoe quase morto durante um assalto. Ele é resgatado por uma meio-elfo, Satera, e seu companheiro, um gato mágico pequeno chamado Puck. Eles estão procurando por algo que foi roubado dela, e Subaru decide ajudar. No entanto, muito em breve, ele descobre que ele de fato tem uma habilidade especial. Quando ele morre, ele começa sua aventura novamente a partir do momento em que ele foi convocado para o mundo de fantasia. Será que ele vai ser capaz de usar sua habilidade para ajudar Satera?

description.en:
After having descended upon this world, the gods have created guilds where adventurers can test their mettle. These guilds, known as "familia," grant adventurers the chance to explore, gather, hunt, or simply enjoy themselves.  
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka Gaiden: Sword Oratoria begins in Orario, the lively city of adventurers. The Sword Princess, Ais Wallenstein, and the novice mage, Lefiya Viridis, are members of the Loki Familia, who are experts at monster hunting. With the rest of their group, they journey to the tower of Babel in hopes of exploring the dungeon underneath. Home to powerful monsters, the dungeon will fulfill Ais's desire to master her sword skills, while bringing Lefiya closer to her dream of succeeding Riveria Ljos Alf, vice-captain of the Loki Familia, as the most powerful mage in the land.

---

description.en: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
description.fr: Le jour où Shiho, champion de kendo décide d’aider sa mère célibataire à tenir un restaurant de gukbap, il apprend que sa sœur, Shiyeon, s’est suicidée. Pendant les funérailles, Shiho se rend compte que quelque chose cloche. Ce n’était pas un suicide, elle a été assassinée. Pour découvrir la vérité et venger la mort de sa sœur, Shiho reprend son sabre et entame sa propre guerre.
description.ru:
В день, когда мастер кендо Шихо решает всё бросить и помочь своей матери-одиночке в управлении небольшим ресторанчиком, он узнаёт о том, что его младшая сестра Шиён, которая училась в университете Сеула, покончила с собой. 
Во время похорон Шихо замечает кое-что странное. 
Чтобы узнать правду и отомстить за смерть сестры, Шихо снова берёт в руки уже знакомый меч и начинает свою собственную войну.

description.en:
Bell Cranel is just trying to find his way in the world. Of course, in his case, the “world” is an enormous dungeon filled with monsters below a city run by gods and goddesses with way too much time on their hands. He’s got big dreams but not much more when a roll on the random encounter die brings him face-to-face with the girl of his dreams—but what’s an amateur adventurer got to offer a brilliant swords woman? And what if the lonely goddess who sponsors his solo adventuring gets jealous?

(Series was cancelled in 2018 for an unknown reason and restarted in 2020 under a sequel title.)
description.ru: Огромный город Орарио - всего лишь вход в подземный лабиринт, широко известный как "Подземелье". Люди приходят туда за славой, честью, приходят, надеясь получить все то, что захотят. И именно здесь парень, мечтающий стать авантюристом, знакомится с маленькой богиней, не нашедшей ни одного последователя.

altTitles.ja: ギャルに優しいオタク君

description.en: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
description.id:
Odakura, seorang anak SMA yang terlihat otaku, dan Narumi, seorang gadis SMA yang terlihat seperti seorang gal. Awalnya, mereka adalah dua kutub yang berlawanan yang tidak akur di sekolah, tetapi secara kebetulan, Odakura menggunakan ketangkasan alaminya untuk mengabulkan permintaan Narumi satu demi satu!? 

Komedi romantis remaja sekolahmu♪
description.ja:
見た目がオタクな男子高校生の小田倉と、ギャルな女子高生の鳴海。
本来は学校でも交わらない真逆のタイプの二人だったけれど、ひょんなことから小田倉は持ち前の手先の器用さで、鳴海の趣味に関するお願い事を次々と叶えていって!?

ギャルの趣味を理解するオタク君の学園青春ラブコメディー♪

---

Mitame ga otakuna danshi kōkōsei no Odagura to, gyaruna mesukōsei no Narumi. Honrai wa gakkō demo majiwaranai magyaku no taipu no futaridattakeredo, hyon'nakotokara Odagura wa mochimae no tesaki no kiyō-sa de, Narumi no shumi ni kansuru o negaigoto o tsugitsugi to kanaete itte!? 

Gyaru no shumi o rikai suru otaku-kun no gakuen seishun rabukomedī ♪
description.pt-br: Odakura, um garoto do ensino médio que parece um otaku, e Narumi, uma garota do ensino médio que se parece com uma gal. Originalmente, eles eram polares opostos que não se davam bem na escola, mas por acaso, Odakura usou sua destreza natural para conceder os desejos da Narumi um após o outro!? Sua comédia romântica escolar da juventude.
